SCREEN_ROT_DOC: Sets orientation for display and all input/output layers.
SHOW_ADVANCED_DOC: Fine-tune rotation for touch, mouse, console, and boot screens.
TOUCH_ROTATION_DOC: Adjust touch input rotation if it does not match screen.
MOUSE_ROTATION_DOC: Adjust mouse input rotation. Most users leave this at System default.
CONSOLE_TEXT_DOC: Console text rotation (TTY). Applies on reboot.
BOOT_LOGO_DOC: Boot splash rotation. Applies on reboot.
MOUSE_C_DOC: If enabled, the mouse cursor is hidden when not in use.
GENERATE_DIAG_DOC: Creates diagnostic report for troubleshooting display issues.
VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_DOC: Show virtual keyboard when touching text fields. Requires kiosk restart.
